channel.title: Invisible items
channel.description:
So i'm using silabs client.. inb4 make your own. (My servers just for me and mates to have some fun, cba making a client for that).
N' most of the items, are invisible. And they don't appear on the floor either. I mean, i can see the name and text when their in my inv, but i can't see the image.
Any ideas?

item.title: Invisible items
item.dc:creator: @Edge94 Edge94
item.description:
@Edge94 wrote:

Are the items that are invisible custom items? If so, then you cannot see them on a silab client. You’ll need a customs client, such as Crazyfaze.

Read full topic
